sqls.findWithDetails: SELECT a.*, u.username as author_name FROM pro_articles a LEFT JOIN pro_users u ON a.author_id = u.id WHERE a.status = ? AND a.deleted_at IS NULL
sqls.getPopularArticles: SELECT a.title, COUNT(c.id) as comment_count FROM pro_articles a LEFT JOIN pro_comments c ON a.id = c.article_id GROUP BY a.id HAVING comment_count >= ? ORDER BY comment_count DESC
